definitions: To extend an arm or something held in the hand in a specified direction in order to touch, grasp, or pick something up.
To arrive at a place, especially after a long journey or effort.
To achieve a particular goal or standard.
To make contact with someone by phone or other means.
To stretch out or extend so as to touch or nearly touch something.
examples: She tried to reach the book on the top shelf.
They finally reached their destination after hours of driving.
He hopes to reach his sales target this quarter.
I'll try to reach him by phone later.
The branches reach across the path.
